meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to instruction.
meanings.sent1: The playground is a noninstructional area where students can play freely.
meanings.sent2: The noninstructional materials were stored in a separate room from the educational supplies.
meanings.sent3: The noninstructional sign on the door confused the new students.
meanings.sent4: Her noninstructional approach to the project allowed for more creativity.
meanings.sent5: The noninstructional atmosphere in the room made it easy to relax.

meanings.sent1: The noninstructional video simply showcased the scenery without any commentary.
meanings.sent2: The noninstructional pamphlet only contained pictures and no instructions.
meanings.sent3: His noninstructional advice left her feeling lost and unsure.
meanings.sent4: The noninstructional silence in the room made her feel uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The noninstructional approach of the tour guide left the group feeling uninformed.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to activities or tasks that do not involve teaching or education.
meanings.sent1: The noninstructional staff members were responsible for maintenance and cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The noninstructional events included a talent show and a food festival.
meanings.sent3: The noninstructional day off was a welcome break from the usual routine.
meanings.sent4: Her noninstructional hobbies included painting and gardening.
meanings.sent5: The noninstructional projects kept the students engaged in hands-on activities.
